You will work across frontend and backend development using Salesforce technologies, collaborate with cross‑functional partners, translate business needs into technical designs, and contribute to modern, AI‑powered customer experiences. * Experience with JavaScript, HTML, and CSS
* Understanding of Salesforce security model (profiles, permission sets, sharing rules)
* Experience with version control systems (Git) and CI/CD tools
* Understanding of software engineering fundamentals (data structures, APIs, testing)
* Experience in Salesforce Data Cloud, Agentforce
* Experience in Cursor / Agentforce Vibe Coding


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Salesforce certifications (e.g., Platform Developer I / II, Sales Cloud, Service Cloud, Agentforce Specialist)
* 5\\+ Years of Software Development experience
* Exposure to Salesforce Data Cloud, Agentforce, or AI\\-driven features
* Experience with integration platforms (Boomi, ETL tools)
* Familiarity with Agile development methodologies


 Suggested Skills
   

  

* Lightning Web Components
* Apex
* Salesforce security model
* Salesforce Sales Cloud
* Salesforce Data Cloud
* Agentforce

 We strongly believe in the well\\-being of our employees and their families. That is why we offer generous health and wellness programs and time away for employees of all levels
